Label: SC_EMERGENCY
Comment: "Numbers must be prefixed with a 1 when dialled from a mobile."

Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment: "CDMA numbers are described in a subcategory to fixed line numbers in the ITU update\ndocument, so those prefixes are added to fixed line (24[23])."

Label: XML_MOBILE
Comment: "68 was added based on info found online."

Label: XML_TOLL_FREE
Comment: "Numbers starting with 8 are listed as value-added in the ITU doc, but only numbers\nstarting with 88 have been found online. These are all listed as being ""num√©ro vert"",\n""ligne verte"" or ""gratuit"" (free)."
